actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The jack-in-irons giant uses its shake the earth ability, and then makes two club attacks and either a chain or fist attack.

actions.name: Club
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 16 (2d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Chain
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or be grappled and restrained (escape DC 18) and the jack-in-irons giant cannot grapple another target. At the beginning of the giant’s turn, it can smash a grappled target into the ground or another solid object within 15 feet of the giant, dealing 11 (1d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Fist
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and the target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Rock
actions.desc: Ranged Weapon Attack: +10 to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. Hit: 23 (3d10 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Shake the Earth
actions.desc: Creatures within 10 feet of the jack-in-irons giant must succeed on a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone.
